changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.network_inference AS SELECT c.id, r1.name AS premise1, r2.name AS premise2, r3.name AS inference, c.notes, up.name AS updated_by, c.update_date FROM ruleform.network_inference c JOIN ruleform.relationship r1 ON c.premise1 = r1.id JOIN ruleform.relationship r2 ON c.premise2 = r2.id JOIN ruleform.relationship r3 ON c.inference = r3.id JOIN ruleform.agency up ON c.updated_by = up.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.network_inference OWNER TO core;
